Major_Arcs.title: Paul Bunyan and the Circus
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Paul Bunyan in a circus setting, his confrontation with Grasso, his recruitment as the new strongman, and his heroic actions against Grasso's sabotage, culminating in his decision to leave the circus.

sub_scenes.title: Circus Performance and Town Excitement
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Paul Bunyan's circus act and the townspeople's enthusiastic reaction to the circus's arrival, setting the stage for the events at the circus grounds.

sub_scenes.title: The Confrontation with Grasso
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the escalating conflict between Paul Bunyan (as Carrumba Matto Grasso) and menacing men, culminating in a gunshot and injury to Paul.

sub_scenes.title: Paul Bunyan's Recruitment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the circus owner recruiting the strong man (Paul Bunyan) to replace the troublesome Grasso, leading to Paul Bunyan's new role.

sub_scenes.title: Grasso's Revenge and Tent Fire
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Grasso's vengeful plot to sabotage Paul Bunyan's performance by setting the circus tent on fire and Paul Bunyan's swift intervention.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Acclaim and Grasso's Envy

sub_scenes.title: Grasso's Second Revenge and the Chase
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Grasso's second attempt at revenge by releasing Gigantico, Paul Bunyan's intervention, and the beginning of the chase after Grasso.

sub_scenes.title: Chase Tactics in the Arena
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the chase within the circus arena, showcasing Grasso's failed attempts to use objects as weapons against Paul Bunyan.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Arena and New Plan
Bucket as a Trick and Continued Escape

sub_scenes.title: Capture and Trapeze Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays Paul Bunyan's capture of Grasso and his unconventional method of threatening him with a trapeze throw.

narrative_arcs.title: The Turn to Fight and Capture

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Paul's Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the circus conflict with Grasso's capture, a job offer to Paul Bunyan, and Paul's decision to return to his preferred quiet life in the woods.

narrative_arcs.title: The Trapeze Toss and Audience Reaction

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo and the Ogress of Tibet
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Marco Polo's encounter with the supernatural, beginning with a mysterious encounter and leading him to a talking severed head, a magical dagger, and ultimately a confrontation with an ogress to rescue a princess.

sub_scenes.title: Marco Polo and the Talking Severed Head
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Marco Polo and his adventures, transitioning to a man's discovery of a talking severed head in a forest, setting a fantastical and mysterious tone.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo's Encounter with the Ogress

sub_scenes.title: The Magical Dagger and Mourning City
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves the man on horseback receiving a magical dagger from a rescued man and then arriving at a city in mourning, setting up new quests and settings.

narrative_arcs.title: The Sacred Dagger and Debt Repayment
The Question of the Knife's Inaction and Farewell

sub_scenes.title: Marco Polo in Hi-toun and the Witch's Castle
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sees Marco Polo arriving in Hi-toun, learning about Princess Lotus's disappearance, offering help, and being led to a witch's castle by a distressed woman.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo's Arrival and Royal Welcome
The King's Grief and Princess Lotus's Disappearance
A Plea from a Starving Woman

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with the Ogress
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves Marco Polo entering the mysterious castle, discovering the woman is an ogress, and preparing to fight her and her monstrous mice.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Mysterious Castle and Strange Children
Confrontation with Monstrous Mice and Sword Drawn

sub_scenes.title: Capture by Cloaked Figure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to a different character being attacked and captured by a cloaked figure using magical fire and snakes, setting up a parallel storyline.

sub_scenes.title: Ogress's Defeat with Magic Knife
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the captured man and Princess Lotus in captivity, the man's realization of having the magic knife, and the ogress's unexpected defeat by it.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of the Special Knife and Hope

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Reunion, and Farewell
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes Marco Polo's immediate quest by showing their escape using the magic knife, reunion with the princess's father, and Marco's departure after refusing a reward.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape from the Dungeon with the Magic Knife
Arrival and the Misunderstanding of Black Drapes

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure of Agra - A Tale of Betrayal and Revenge
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells a story of betrayal, imprisonment, and revenge centered around a treasure hidden in Agra, narrated by a Treasure Keeper and focusing on the character Joseph Jordan.

sub_scenes.title: Treasure Story Prologue and Setting
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up the treasure story with a prologue and introduces the setting of a British penal colony in the tropics.

sub_scenes.title: The Prisoner's Bargain
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the prisoner Joseph Jordan making a bargain with Captain Brooking, offering treasure for escape.

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal and Revenge Vow
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals Captain Brooking's betrayal, Jordan's subsequent imprisonment, his release after years, and his vow to seek revenge.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Deceptive Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays Jordan's patient wait and eventual confrontation with Brooking, leading to a seemingly peaceful resolution at Brooking's home which is deceptive.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Resolution at Brooking's Home

sub_scenes.title: Attic Betrayal and Death
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the climax of the revenge plot in the attic, where betrayal is revealed and leads to a violent fight and Brooking's death.

narrative_arcs.title: Journey to the Attic and Treasure Reveal

sub_scenes.title: Police Chase and Moral Conclusion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the immediate aftermath of the murder, including police investigation, Jordan's escape attempt, and a concluding moral reflection on treasure.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Investigate Shot and Discover Body

Major_Arcs.title: Dr. Styx and the Haunting of Matthews Estate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Dr. Styx as he investigates the haunted Matthews Estate, confronts the ghost of Vincent Matthews, and guides him towards redemption through forgiveness and brotherly love.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Dr. Styx and Courtroom Drama
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Dr. Styx in an ominous scenario and then shifts to a courtroom setting where Vincent Matthews is sentenced for murder, setting up the backstory for the haunting.

sub_scenes.title: The Haunted Matthews Estate
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene establishes the problem of the haunted Matthews Estate and introduces Dr. Styx's role as a supernatural expert called in to investigate.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Vincent Matthews' Ghost
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Mr. Northrup's arrival at the haunted estate, his encounter with Vincent Matthews' ghost, and their initial antagonistic exchange.

sub_scenes.title: Physical Struggle with Ghost
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the physical struggle between Mr. Northrup and Vincent Matthews' ghost, showing the ghost gaining an advantage and then Northrup breaking free.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Attack and Claim of Power

sub_scenes.title: The Path to Redemption and Rosalind's Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features a cloaked man guiding a seated man towards redemption through forgiveness, revealing the seated man's past crime of murdering his sister Rosalind.

narrative_arcs.title: Questioning Violence and Shifting Power Dynamics
Confession of Fear and Societal Position
The Solution of Forgiveness and Love
The Revelation of Rosalind and the Murder

sub_scenes.title: Summoning Rosalind
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the cloaked man forcing the seated man (Vincent Matthews) to confront his past and dramatically summoning the ghost of Rosalind Matthews.

sub_scenes.title: Forgiveness and Brotherly Love
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Rosalind's forgiveness of Vincent and the cloaked man's declaration of brotherly love, leading to Vincent's spiritual release.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Brotherly Love and Release

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Return to Normalcy
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the supernatural intervention with Vincent's remorse, Rosalind's forgiveness, their departure as spirits, and the cloaked man's return to the mundane world.

Major_Arcs.title: The Voyages of Henry Hudson - The Northwest Passage
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc narrates Henry Hudson's persistent quest for the Northwest Passage to China, detailing his voyages, crew tensions, disappointments, mutiny, and ultimate mysterious fate.

sub_scenes.title: Henry Hudson's New Voyage
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the historical context of Henry Hudson's search for the Northwest Passage and sets up his new voyage backed by the Dutch East India Company.

narrative_arcs.title: The Enigma of Henry Hudson's Fate
The Dutch East India Company's Proposition

sub_scenes.title: Hudson's First Voyage and Disappointment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays Hudson's first voyage, rising crew tensions, the exploration of the Hudson River, and the eventual disappointment and return to Holland.

narrative_arcs.title: Rising Tensions and a Turn Southward
Entering the Hudson River with Hope
Hudson's Resignation and Decision to Return

sub_scenes.title: Hudson's Second Voyage and Wintering
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Hudson's second voyage, getting trapped in ice, the crew's discontent during winter, and the disagreement about continuing the voyage in spring.

narrative_arcs.title: Another Voyage Backed by a New Company
Trapped in Ice and Winter Quarters
The Ice Melts and Disagreement Over Course

sub_scenes.title: The Mutiny and its Consequences
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the crew's mutiny against Hudson, his ousting from the ship, being set adrift, and the mutineers' eventual return and arrest.

narrative_arcs.title: Scuffle and Ousting of Captain Hudson
Captain Hudson Set Adrift and Mutineers' Departure

Major_Arcs.title: Hassan the Arabian Knight and the Rescue of Ali-Ben-Ali's Daughter
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Hassan the Arabian Knight on a mission to rescue the kidnapped daughter of Ali-Ben-Ali from the Tartars, showcasing his bravery, combat skills, and eventual romantic reward.

sub_scenes.title: Hassan's Mission and the Chase
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Hassan in a chase and then explains his mission given by the Caliph to rescue the kidnapped daughter from Kurgan and the Tartars.

narrative_arcs.title: Summoned by the Caliph for a Rescue Mission

sub_scenes.title: Hassan's Journey and Warnings
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Hassan setting off on his mission, finding Tartar tracks at an oasis, and receiving warnings from a traveler about the dangers ahead, which he bravely ignores.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting off to Confront the Tartars

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration of the Tartar Camp
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Hassan reaching the Tartar camp, ambushing a sentry, using his cloak as a disguise to infiltrate, and confirming the daughter's presence.

narrative_arcs.title: Inside the Tartar Camp and Confirmation of the Daughter

sub_scenes.title: Detection and Capture in Camp
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Hassan making contact with the prisoner who is revealed to be his aide, but then being detected, confronted, and captured by Tartar soldiers.

narrative_arcs.title: Detection and Confrontation by Tartar Soldiers

sub_scenes.title: Kurgan's Challenge and Hassan's Resolve
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Hassan's interrogation by Kurgan, Kurgan's challenge to fight three warriors, the negotiation of combat terms, and Hassan's resolute determination to win.

sub_scenes.title: Hassan's Contest - Initial Phase
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the beginning of the contest, the signal to start, Hassan's unconventional use of dirt as a weapon, and his initial success against two opponents.

narrative_arcs.title: The Signal and the Start of the Contest
Dirt as a Weapon and Initial Attack
Exploiting the Advantage and Close Combat

sub_scenes.title: Hassan's Contest - Climax and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays the climax of Hassan's fight, including sword combat, a decisive throw, his refusal of mercy, and the subsequent negotiation with Kurgan for his reward.

sub_scenes.title: Farewell and Romantic Gesture
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes Hassan's mission with farewells, clarification about a past kiss, a developing romantic interest, and a final, more personal kiss as a reward.
